panels.description: Request rate at gateway (external client requests)
panels.title: Gateway Request Rate (Client-Facing)

panels.description: Rate of auth failures at gateway (4xx errors)
panels.title: Gateway Error Rate (Auth/ACL Failures)

panels.description: Error types seen at gateway level
panels.title: Gateway Error Types (Last 5m)

panels.description: HTTP status code distribution at gateway
panels.title: Gateway Status Codes (Last 5m)

panels.description: Request rate at API layer (internal, forwarded from gateway)

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_requests_total{job="otel-collector", handler!~"gateway.*", main_account=~"$main_account", subaccount_id=~"$subaccount_id", handler=~"$endpoint", handler!="metrics_endpoint"}[5m])) by (method)

panels.title: API Request Rate (Internal, from Gateway)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="otel-collector", handler!~"gateway.*", main_account=~"$main_account", subaccount_id=~"$subaccount_id", handler=~"$endpoint", handler!="metrics_endpoint"}[5m]))

histogram_quantile(0.50, rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="otel-collector", handler!~"gateway.*", main_account=~"$main_account", subaccount_id=~"$subaccount_id", handler=~"$endpoint", handler!="metrics_endpoint"}[5m]))

(sum(rate(cache_hits_total{job="otel-collector", main_account=~"$main_account", subaccount_id=~"$subaccount_id"}[5m])) or vector(0)) / ((sum(rate(cache_hits_total{job="otel-collector", main_account=~"$main_account", subaccount_id=~"$subaccount_id"}[5m])) or vector(0)) + (sum(rate(cache_misses_total{job="otel-collector", main_account=~"$main_account", subaccount_id=~"$subaccount_id"}[5m])) or vector(0)) + 0.0001) * 100

sum(rate(http_request_bytes_total{job="otel-collector", direction="in", handler!~"gateway.*", main_account=~"$main_account", subaccount_id=~"$subaccount_id", handler=~"$endpoint", handler!="metrics_endpoint"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_response_bytes_total{job="otel-collector", direction="out", handler!~"gateway.*", main_account=~"$main_account", subaccount_id=~"$subaccount_id", handler=~"$endpoint", handler!="metrics_endpoint"}[5m]))
sum by (error_type) (increase(s3_errors_total{job="otel-collector", operation!~"gateway.*", main_account=~"$main_account", subaccount_id=~"$subaccount_id", operation=~"$endpoint"}[$__interval]))
